name: HPG Technology
tag_list: design-website, website, crm, opensource, data-replication, data-migration
overview:
HPG Technology provides the software solution as a service.

HPG Technology provides software as a service including simple web design&hosting services to application specific software services, e.g. CRM, Social&Business collaboration. Outstanding HPG services include OpenSource consulting services, OpenSource support services. Recently, by partnering with HiT Software Inc., HPG Technology provides high performance relational database access services through HitSW products for web and client/server applications including .NET, ODBC, JDBC, and OLEDB SQL middleware products for IBM DB2 Server access; Allora XML-RDB transformation middleware; DBMoto data replication for relational databases including DB2, SQL Server and Oracle databases as well as others; and SafeConduct data security for new and legacy application access across the Internet.
